channel.description: Recent content in research on Collaborations Workshop Ideas & Pitches

item.title: Does grade inflation exist?
item.description: CW20 - 2020-03-31 to 2020-04-02 Does grade inflation exist? - CI6-CW20 Participants Jez Cope Philip Grylls Pablo Bernabeu Frances Cooper Tania Allard Context / Research Domain New university students often do not have the skills expected when they begin their degree courses. One reason for this may be that universities are less able to distinguish between student skills due to grade inflation. Grade inflation is the process whereby exam questions become easier each year, meaning more students achieve higher grades.

item.title: Enabling analysis of research software: Creating an enhanced research software corpus
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Batey-1941 - HP2-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer Neil Chue Hong and Stephan Druskat This document should be used to capture the information for a Hack Day Idea. Idea name (provisional) This is the provisional name of the Idea, solution or just a title; this can be changed later if a team is formed and you decide on a new team/product name. Enabling analysis of research software: Creating an enhanced research software corpus
